meanings.definition: Things that are not able to exist or work together harmoniously.
meanings.sent1: The two chemicals were incompatibles and caused a dangerous reaction when mixed.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibles in the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibles in the recipe resulted in a cake that tasted like soap.
meanings.sent4: Their personalities clashed like incompatibles, creating tension in the group.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibles of oil and water were evident in the separation of the two liquids.

meanings.definition: People who are not able to get along or agree with each other.
meanings.sent1: The incompatibles at the office constantly argued over every decision.
meanings.sent2: The incompatibles in the family reunion made for an awkward gathering.
meanings.sent3: The incompatibles on the debate team always managed to turn discussions into chaos.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like incompatibles, always leading to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The incompatibles in the group project made collaboration difficult and stressful.
